reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Economic empowerment (autonomisation) of young deaf in Gaza

description.narrative: The idea of the project is to provide technical and artistic professional training for 40 deaf people between 18 and 35 years old. The participants will be divided in to 4 groups of 4 different ateliers (hairdressing, embroidery, handloom, carpentry). Each group will receive 100 hours of training during one month. The association will provide for all deaf trainees, jobs for two months in collaboration with a Palestinian labour ministry in the same workshops.
